summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the sale to Forsberg Bros., Inc. of timber-cutting rights on certain City land (east half, Section 23, Township 22 North, Range 8 East, W.M.) in the Cedar River Watershed for a consideration to be paid in the form of a conveyance to the City of certain real property in the west one-half of section 4, and the east one-half of section 5, Township 35 North, Range 10 East, W.M., to be exchanged for United States Forest Service land in the Cedar River Watershed and authorizing execution of a Timber Sale Agreement in such connection.
